--- In gladiator@y..., "cooldude5788" <cooldude5788@y...> wrote:
> I already made Unix Series 1 but I need to continue to the next pack 
> because if you read the Unix Guide it says that Jarketa was raised 
> with other people from his army by a strong cleric and at the end he 
> is still alive, only Charles' castle is dismantled but no one is 
dead 
> and I need some ideas. The only thing I know about the next series 
is 
> more of the Orcian Empire. Maybe you can help.

One comment: The lowest experience level of my own 100% legitimate 
team is experience level 94. It has been through all the built-in 
scenarios, the tevfifty and my own set.  I am concerned about crashing 
the game because of acquiring too much experience for a single player.

One Question: What scenarios should a player have completed before 
going into the Unix series into order to avoid problems handling the 
opponents?
